mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, METER_ID, LOAD_CHANGE_SIGN, TRANSFORMER_GROUP_NO, TRANSFORMER_ID, SUBS_ID, LINE_ID, MS_TYPE, CAPACITY, IS_PUB_TYPE, STAND_TIME, CREATE_DATE, REMARK, STATUS, START_DATE, CHG_MAN, CHG_DATE, CHG_ADDRESS, DESK_NAME, TRANSFORMER_REL_ID, TRANSFORMER_NO, SUBS_NAME, LINE_NAME, TRANSFORMER_LOSS_TYPE, BUSINESS_PLACE_CODE, TASK_ID, FLAG
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from APP_TRANSFORMER_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.update:
update APP_TRANSFORMER_INFO
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APP_ID = #{record.appId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
METER_ID = #{record.meterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LOAD_CHANGE_SIGN = #{record.loadChangeSign,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TRANSFORMER_GROUP_NO = #{record.transformerGroupNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFORMER_ID = #{record.transformerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SUBS_ID = #{record.subsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LINE_ID = #{record.lineId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MS_TYPE = #{record.msType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
CAPACITY = #{record.capacity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_PUB_TYPE = #{record.isPubType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
STAND_TIME = #{record.standTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
START_DATE = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CHG_MAN = #{record.chgMan,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHG_DATE = #{record.chgDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CHG_ADDRESS = #{record.chgAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESK_NAME = #{record.deskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFORMER_REL_ID = #{record.transformerRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TRANSFORMER_NO = #{record.transformerNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SUBS_NAME = #{record.subsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINE_NAME = #{record.lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFORMER_LOSS_TYPE = #{record.transformerLossType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
BUSINESS_PLACE_CODE = #{record.businessPlaceCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TASK_ID = #{record.taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FLAG = #{record.flag,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

update APP_TRANSFORMER_INFO set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APP_ID = #{record.appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, METER_ID = #{record.meterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LOAD_CHANGE_SIGN = #{record.loadChangeSign,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRANSFORMER_GROUP_NO = #{record.transformerGroupNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFORMER_ID = #{record.transformerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SUBS_ID = #{record.subsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LINE_ID = #{record.lineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MS_TYPE = #{record.msType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, CAPACITY = #{record.capacity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_PUB_TYPE = #{record.isPubType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, STAND_TIME = #{record.standTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, START_DATE = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHG_MAN = #{record.chgMan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHG_DATE = #{record.chgDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHG_ADDRESS = #{record.chgAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESK_NAME = #{record.deskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFORMER_REL_ID = #{record.transformerRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRANSFORMER_NO = #{record.transformerNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SUBS_NAME = #{record.subsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINE_NAME = #{record.lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFORMER_LOSS_TYPE = #{record.transformerLossType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, BUSINESS_PLACE_CODE = #{record.businessPlaceCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TASK_ID = #{record.taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{record.flag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: SELECT T.ID, 'TRUE' expand, CONCAT('变压器_', T.TRANSFORMER_ASSETS_NO) title, T.TRANSFORMER_ASSETS_NO sn, T.LOAD_CHANGE_SIGN loadChangeSign, 'TRANS' siteSurveyType FROM APP_TRANSFORMER_INFO T WHERE T.APP_ID=#{appId}

SELECT , 0 parent, '变压器信息' showName1, CONCAT(TRANSFORMER_NO,'(资产号)') showName2, CONCAT(DESK_NAME,'(名称)') showName3, CONCAT(CAPACITY,'(容量)') showName4 FROM APP_TRANSFORMER_INFO T WHERE T.APP_ID=#{appId}
